definition: (coll.) to get one's just deserts/to serve sb right/to get one's share of (good or bad things)/every dog has its day

sentences.english: Look for more to come and enjoy today's feature.
sentences.chinese: 敬请期待后续报道，享受今天的内容。

sentences.english: While it was a great day, I got a bit sunburned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 今天过得很棒，但我在水里把自己给晒伤了。

sentences.english: I forbid you to make a sortie today.

sentences.chinese: 1759年的今天，英国占领魁北克城。

sentences.english: I finished watching the movie The Proposal this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我看完了电影《假结婚》。

sentences.english: And today his campaign expects more super delegates will be announcing their support for Obama. Mara Liasson, NPR News, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 今天在竞选中他期待更多超级代表的选票。

sentences.english: Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival, but I get up late as usual.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中秋节，但我还是一如往常的晚起。

sentences.english: The exchange rate fluctuates every day.
sentences.chinese: 今天的汇率比昨天稍微低一点儿。

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界卫生日，我祝愿你们大家身心健康。

sentences.english: Yes, yesterday was the my pay-day; I pay you the payment today.
sentences.chinese: 是地，昨天是咋哒发薪日，俺今天付给你报酬。

sentences.english: Today play bullfight lose 1500 dollars depressing dead.
sentences.chinese: 今天打斗牛输啦1500块钱郁闷死了。

sentences.english: Today girls are going for the women's individual all-around final.
sentences.chinese: 今天女孩子们要为个人全能拼搏了。

sentences.english: Many data warehousing managers ask these questions today.
sentences.chinese: 今天又很多数据仓库项目经理都在问以上的问题。

sentences.english: Today, many e-wastes added into national hazardous waste list.
sentences.chinese: 今天，许多电子废物上了国家危险废物名录。

sentences.english: "Will Old Tang come today?" she asked.
Today, why is there no one to our class come from?
sentences.chinese: 今天为什么没有人到我们班来呢？

definition: to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
